__e: One day, I shall prove my loyalty, to you and to the King.
Veronica is doing things that I'm interested in, and I almost turned it down out of some strange loyalty to you.
Loyalty aside, you should think of yourself!
There's no call upon your loyalty as a wife.
No, that's not fair and you know it, because Mike's loyalty is the reason you're not in prison.
It's not that I still care about her, but it's about loyalty and friendship and...
My loyalty to Travis is second only to mine for you and to our cause.
I gave him yours. I guess I was being loyal to Jenny, who told me she didn't have a father.
I tell you this, coward. If you get out alive, we'll put together our own court and execute you for treason!
So, when you talk ethics and values and honesty... and I'm a nice guy and you're a nice guy... this and that, you know, I mean, it just doesn't matter.
He knows nothing of loyalty and respect.
It gave you committment, with body and soul, every waking hour, to a world that takes that loyalty, and cares not one spot for you in return.
I know you know about me... that my loyalties aren't just to you but to a man you've grown to despise.
And because my loyalty lies not just to my party, but to my country.
I know you know about me-- that my loyalties aren't just to you.
And because my loyalty lies not just to my party, but to my country.
I know you know about me-- that my loyalties aren't just to you.
'Cause outside a goddamn dog, that kind of loyalty, my kind of shit, don't get no more dedicated
Look, this is a chance for us to show the good that we do, that his loyalty is in the right place with us.
My first loyalty would always be to the firm.
Loyalty's one thing, Danny, but what your mates did to that girl is sick.
